SELECT a.NTT_ID, a.NTT_SJ, a.FRST_REGISTER_ID, IFNULL(b.USER_NM, a.NTCR_NM) as FRST_REGISTER_NM, DATE_FORMAT(a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, '%Y-%m-%d') as FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, a.RDCNT, a.PARNTSCTT_NO, a.ANSWER_AT, a.ANSWER_LC, a.USE_AT, a.ATCH_FILE_ID, a.BBS_ID, a.NTCE_BGNDE, a.NTCE_ENDDE, a.SJ_BOLD_AT, a.NOTICE_AT, a.SECRET_AT, c.COMMENT_CO
, b.DEPT_CODE as DEPT_CODE , b.TITLE_CODE as TITLE_CODE , b.POSITION_CODE as POSITION_CODE , b.RANK_CODE as RANK_CODE , cda.CODE_NM as DEPT_NM_F , cda.CODE_DC as DEPT_NM_S , cdb.CODE_NM as TITLE_NM , cdc.CODE_NM as POSITION_NM , cdd.CODE_NM as RANK_NM , d.PICKS_CO as PICKS_CO , c.SCORE_S as SCORE_S , CAST(ROUND(c.SCORE_S/c.COMMENT_CO,1)*10 AS UNSIGNED) AS SCORE_A , e.REPLY_REG_CO as REPLY_REG_CO
FROM LETTNBBS a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVNUSERMASTER b ON a.FRST_REGISTER_ID = b.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN comtccmmndetailcode cda ON b.DEPT_CODE = cda.CODE AND cda.CODE_ID = 'IBK001' AND cda.USE_AT ='Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN comtccmmndetailcode cdb ON b.TITLE_CODE = cdb.CODE AND cdb.CODE_ID = 'IBK002' AND cdb.USE_AT ='Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN comtccmmndetailcode cdc ON b.POSITION_CODE = cdc.CODE AND cdc.CODE_ID = 'IBK003' AND cdc.USE_AT ='Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN comtccmmndetailcode cdd ON b.RANK_CODE = cdd.CODE AND cdd.CODE_ID = 'IBK004' AND cdd.USE_AT ='Y'
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT NTT_ID, BBS_ID, COUNT(1) AS COMMENT_CO, SUM(SCORE) AS SCORE_S FROM LETTNCOMMENT WHERE USE_AT = 'Y' GROUP BY NTT_ID, BBS_ID) c ON a.NTT_ID = c.NTT_ID AND a.BBS_ID = c.BBS_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT NTT_ID, BBS_ID, COUNT(1) AS PICKS_CO FROM LETTNCOMMENT WHERE USE_AT = 'Y' and PICKS_AT='Y' GROUP BY NTT_ID, BBS_ID) d ON a.NTT_ID = d.NTT_ID AND a.BBS_ID = d.BBS_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT NTT_ID, BBS_ID, COUNT(1) AS REPLY_REG_CO FROM LETTNCOMMENT WHERE USE_AT = 'Y' and WRTER_ID=#{searchId} GROUP BY NTT_ID, BBS_ID) e ON a.NTT_ID = e.NTT_ID AND a.BBS_ID = e.BBS_ID
WHERE a.BBS_ID = #{bbsId} AND a.USE_AT = 'Y'
AND a.NTT_SJ LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchWrd},'%')
AND a.NTT_CN LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchWrd},'%')
AND b.USER_NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchWrd},'%')
